saving and loading
[equidistant grid (grid)]


Functions

bool surfit::grid_save (const char *filename)
 saves surfit_grid to file named filename in active rw_mode. This function uses ROFF format (see datafile for details)
bool surfit::grid_load (const char *filename, const char *gridname=NULL)
 loads surfit_grid named 'geomname' from ROFF file (see datafile for details)
void surfit::grid_unload ()
 unloads surfit_grid from memory
